DOC.brief_summary: The aim investigate whether 16 week high intensity interval training , follow 36 week home-based exercise , improve menstrual frequency woman Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS ) compare non-exercising control group .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Reproductive Function Women With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome High Intensity Interval Training
DOC.criteria: Polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) Regular high intensity endurance ( two time per week vigorous exercise ) . Concurrent treatment ( insulin sensitizer drug know affect gonadotropin ovulation , wash period 1 month prior inclusion ) . Ongoing pregnancy .
